    • Method Detail

      • addOrUpdateNote

        @Deprecated
public NoteResponse addOrUpdateNote(Long accountId,
                                      Enums.ClassNameApiMap notableType,
                                      Long notableId,
                                      Long noteId,
                                      String comment,
                                      List<Long> assetIds,
                                      List<String> tags,
                                      Enums.PermissionableType permissionableType,
                                      Long permissionableId,
                                      String appKey,
                                      String locationDescription,
                                      Location location)
                             throws SirqulException
        Deprecated. 
        This is used to leave a comment (note) on albums, album contests, assets, game levels, and theme descriptors. For example, if I like a level, I can leave a comment on it so that other users can see it.

        Target API Endpoint: /comment
        Parameters:
        accountId - The unique accountId that made the request (either deviceId or accountId must be used)
        notableType - The type of notable object {ALBUM, ALBUM_CONTEST, ASSET, GAME_LEVEL, THEME_DESCRIPTOR}
        notableId - The id of the notable object
        noteId - The id of the note, used when editing a comment (leave empty for creating a new comment)
        comment - The message the user wishes to leave a comment on
        assetIds - A comma separated list of asset IDs to add with the note
        tags - search tags
        permissionableType - This is used for sending out group notifications. For example, when someone adds a note to an asset which is also a part of an album, everyone in the album will receive a notification. This is achieved by passing in the permissionable type (in this case "album"), and the permissionable id (the album id). Possible types: {ALBUM, ALBUM_CONTEST, GAME_LEVEL, THEME_DESCRIPTOR}
        permissionableId - The id of the permissionable object (for sending group notifications)
        appKey - the application key used to identify the application. Maps to "gameType".
        locationDescription - The description of the location
        location - the current location of the user
        Returns:
        a NoteResponse on valid response, or SirqulResponse with error message
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • createNote

        public NoteResponse createNote(Long accountId,
                      Enums.ClassNameApiMap notableType,
                      Long notableId,
                      String comment,
                      List<Long> assetIds,
                      List<String> tags,
                      Enums.PermissionableType permissionableType,
                      Long permissionableId,
                      String appKey,
                      String locationDescription,
                      Location location)
                        throws SirqulException
        This is used to leave a comment (note) on a notable object (i.e. albums, album contests, assets, game levels, offers, offer locations, retailers, retailer locations, and theme descriptors). Leaving a comment on a notable object will be visiable to everyone who has access to view the object.

        Target API Endpoint: /note/create
        Parameters:
        accountId - The unique accountId that made the request (either deviceId or accountId must be used)
        notableType - The notable object type {ALBUM, ALBUM_CONTEST, ASSET, GAME_LEVEL, OFFER, OFFER_LOCATION, RETAILER, RETAILER_LOCATION, THEME_DESCRIPTOR}
        notableId - The id of the notable object
        comment - The message the user wishes to leave a comment on
        assetIds - A comma separated list of asset IDs to add with the note
        tags - search tags
        permissionableType - This is used for sending out group notifications. For example, when someone adds a note to an asset which is also a part of an album, everyone in the album will receive a notification. This is achieved by passing in the permissionable type (in this case "album"), and the permissionable id (the album id). Possible types: {ALBUM, ALBUM_CONTEST, GAME_LEVEL, THEME_DESCRIPTOR}
        permissionableId - The id of the permissionable object (for sending group notifications)
        appKey - The application key used to identify the application
        locationDescription - The description of the location
        location - the location of the user, maps to latitude and longitude
        Returns:
        NoteResponse on success, SirqulResponse on failure
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • deleteNote

        public SirqulResponse deleteNote(Long accountId,
                        Long noteId,
                        Location location)
                          throws SirqulException
        Sets a comment (note) as deleted.

        Target API Endpoint: /note/delete
        Parameters:
        accountId - The unique accountId that made the request (either deviceId or accountId must be used)
        noteId - The ID of the note to delete
        location - the location of the user, maps to latitude and longitude
        Returns:
        SirqulResponse with success or error message
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • searchNotes

        public SearchResponse<NoteResponse> searchNotes(Long accountId,
                                       Enums.ClassNameApiMap notableType,
                                       Long notableId,
                                       String keyword,
                                       Enums.NoteApiMap sortField,
                                       Boolean descending,
                                       Integer start,
                                       Integer limit)
                                         throws SirqulException
        Search for notes on a notable object.

        Target API Endpoint: /note/search
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required)
        notableType - The notable object type {ALBUM, ALBUM_CONTEST, ASSET, GAME_LEVEL, OFFER, OFFER_LOCATION, RETAILER, RETAILER_LOCATION, THEME_DESCRIPTOR}
        notableId - The id of the notable object
        keyword - The keyword used to search
        sortField - The column to sort the search on
        descending - The order to return the search results
        start - The record to begin the return set on
        limit - The number of records to return
        Returns:
        SearchResponse<NoteResponse> on a valid response, SirqulResponse on an invalid response
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • updateNote

        public NoteResponse updateNote(Long accountId,
                      Long noteId,
                      String comment,
                      List<Long> assetIds,
                      List<String> tags,
                      Enums.PermissionableType permissionableType,
                      Long permissionableId,
                      String appKey,
                      String locationDescription,
                      Location location)
                        throws SirqulException
        Update an existing comment (note). Only the creator of the note have permission to update.

        Target API Endpoint: /note/update
        Parameters:
        accountId - The unique accountId that made the request (either deviceId or accountId must be used)
        noteId - The id of the note, used when editing a comment
        comment - The message the user wishes to leave a comment on
        assetIds - A list of asset IDs to add with the note
        tags - A list of search tags
        permissionableType - This is used for sending out group notifications. For example, when someone adds a note to an asset which is also a part of an album, everyone in the album will receive a notification. This is achieved by passing in the permissionable type (in this case "album"), and the permissionable id (the album id). Possible types: {ALBUM, ALBUM_CONTEST, GAME_LEVEL, THEME_DESCRIPTOR}
        permissionableId - The id of the permissionable object (for sending group notifications)
        appKey - The application key used to identify the application
        locationDescription - The description of the location
        location - the location of the user, maps to latitude and longitude
        Returns:
        NoteResponse on success, SirqulResponse on failure
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.
